sentences.sentence: Most of the time, we're not expert billiards players.
sentences.translation: 大多数时候，我们不是专业的台球选手。

sentences.sentence: He loved to play chess and he loved to play billiards.
Badmin was able to beat Bill at billiards, but Bill always beat Badmin badly at badminton.
sentences.translation: 巴德明在台球上能够打败比尔，但是打羽毛球比尔常常大败巴德明。
